# Code book

## Modification
The original data was modifies by:  
* Mergeing the test and train sets to create one data set  
* Extract the mean and standard deviation for each measurement  
* Useing descriptive activity names to name the activities in the data set  
* Label the data set with descriptive variable names  
* Creating a second tidy data set with the average of each variable for each activity and subject  

## Descriptions
The first two columns activity and subject are identifiers  
* subject: the ID of the subject  
* activity: the name of the activity perfomed by the subject when measurement were taken

## Variables
For the first data set i use the original variable names.  
For the second data set just add the string '_mean' to all original variable names
